info.name: Google Search - Turquoise Background
info.description:
Google Search Results page with turquoise background & mediumblue Links. See also my style 15219.

Also more than other 10 small color tweaks for some specific Google applications/services.

Suggestion - If you use Greasemonkey's GoogleMonkeyR (GMR) use #FAFAE6  for the  the background color of its (GMR's) settings.
